title: Lets talk about the new punishment system about to be relased on OCE
body:
So far i've heard from mates in NA its quite effective and fast.
also get alot of feedback if a person is punished for their crimes.

I for one am looking forward to the upcoming behaviour change, its a step in the right direction.


What do you guys think?

replies.body: i can see sart getting banned by this constantly.
Wait how does it work? Does it tell the person who reported that justice has been served?
Correct, it gives you a prompt, stating that a person who you have reported was punished.

GG Riot finally figured out that people won't keep reporting if they don't see anything come out of it. I could see this system being really really good tbh just because of the amount of people who will use it now because they can see it working with their own eyes.
No more "reporting doesn't work" posts. YAY!
People still spam reports for no reason whatsoever, so we'll still see "reports don't work" from people whose reports mean nothing.

its pretty harsh atm, people getting quite strong bans ranging from from 3-14 days.

its also harsher for ranked games, which will be good.

> [{quoted}](name=Exhausted,realm=OCE,application-id=Ntey9fRZ,discussion-id=PHqljN8i,comment-id=0001000000000001,timestamp=2015-05-23T10:10:33.476+0000)
>
> its pretty harsh atm, people getting quite strong bans ranging from from 3-14 days.
> 
> its also harsher for ranked games, which will be good.

Is it live on OCE now? If so I might start playing again a little bit because this community is a large part of the reason I stopped.

No!

not on OCE atm, its on NA atm and will be deployed on other servers in the coming weeks
Ah k den.
I'm just imagining how many butthurt mouth-breathers out there are going to start foaming at the mouth and jacking off when they get a notification after I inevitably get banned.
Maybe change your ways then?
well then your accounts days are numbered good sir.

> [{quoted}](name=Exhausted,realm=OCE,application-id=Ntey9fRZ,discussion-id=PHqljN8i,comment-id=0000000000000000,timestamp=2015-05-23T12:16:01.870+0000)
>
> well then your accounts days are numbered good sir.

He did say that himself
What about false reporting? Are there counters to this, or counters to people being reported for poor reasons, such as one bad decision at the end of a game which ends in a loss?

Quote from riotlyte

The system ignored votes from people who were spamming responses, and it never affected cases.
In the new system, these types of voters will again just be ignored.
Yes.

It depends on how this system actually works towards detecting "true" ragers and abusive teammates in games.. if it's just "keywords" that's not really effective.. because if you mention one of them (for example if you quote someone saying stuff like that) and because said person you are quoting (rager) is an idiot and reports you.. then you get punished for quoting stuff he has said (even if you weren't raging or being abusive).

It would require people to actually look at logs and see, though with the sort of staff that are in charge of the reporting for OCE, i don't see this being effective either as they are kind of incompetent.
i mean they've been testing the system for over years so you think they'd have this down :) !

Btw I do harbour my own concerns about this new system, it kinda feels like you are handing a loaded gun to the oce community and then telling them it works. 

Yes spamming reporters are inevitably ignored but the first few could be very destructive if they are inconveniently believable (talking liars and truth twisters who pull shit out of context ect ect)

Forgive me for saying this but I really don't trust this system for having abuse protection with all of the trolls out there
if you know that you've been unfairly banned you can plea to riot support !
Is the new system going to bring up/scan games from pre-release?
tbh i have no idea on that one mate
